Instance Property# inclusiveRange

iOS 16.0+iPadOS 16.0+Mac CatalystmacOS 13.0+tvOS 16.0+visionOSwatchOS 9.0+

```
final var inclusiveRange: IntentParameter<Value>.InclusiveRange<Decimal>? { get }
```

Available when `Value` conforms to `_IntentValue`, `Value` conforms to `Sendable`, and `Value.ValueType` is `IntentCurrencyAmount`.## [See Also](/documentation/AppIntents/IntentParameter/inclusiveRange-swift.property#see-also)
